擴列.definition: (Internet slang) to add a friend (on a social network etc)

擴印.definition: to enlarge (a photo); to print larger

擴增.definition: to augment; to amplify; to extend; to expand

擴大.definition: to expand; to enlarge; to broaden one's scope

擴大再生產.definition: to expand production; to reproduce on an extended scale

擴大化.definition: to extend the scope; to exaggerate

擴孔.definition: to widen a tube; to ream (i.e. widen a hole)

擴容.definition: to ramp up capacity; to expand in scale

擴展.definition: to extend; to expand; extension; expansion

擴展程序.definition: (computing) extension (for a software application, esp. web browsers)

擴建.definition: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)

擴張.definition: expansion; dilation; to expand (e.g. one's power or influence); to broaden

擴散.definition: to spread; to proliferate; to diffuse

擴散周知.definition: to let everyone know; spread the word!

擴版.definition: to increase the number of pages or the size of the pages of a publication

擴編.definition: to expand (esp. by new recruitment); to increase the army; to augment
